explains: n. [分化] 烧瓶；长颈瓶，细颈瓶；酒瓶，携带瓶
wordGroup: vacuum flask 保温瓶；真空瓶；热水瓶
thermos flask 热水瓶；保温瓶

sentences.en: He took out a metal flask from a canvas bag.
sentences.cn: 他从帆布袋里拿出了一个金属水瓶。

sentences.en: There are some sandwiches here and a flask of coffee.
sentences.cn: 这儿有一些三明治和一瓶咖啡。

sentences.en: The flask is completely watertight, even when laid on its side.
sentences.cn: 这水瓶即使平放也不漏一滴水。
